thread.title: Quiz: How Many Of These Ways Did You Rebel As A Teenager?
thread.title_full: Quiz: How Many Of These Ways Did You Rebel As A Teenager?

title: Quiz: How Many Of These Ways Did You Rebel As A Teenager?
text: Young, reckless, and so over it all. It’s a phase everyone has, but how rebellious were your teenage years? 1. Check off all the ways you rebelled as a teenager: Drove around with my turn signal on constantly. Mailed Ringo Starr a picture of myself giving the middle finger. Got a tattoo of Jackie Chan kissing Princess Diana. Struck out on purpose in each at-bat every time my dad showed up to one of my games. Got into the Guinness Book Of World Records for having the world’s stupidest parents. Grew out my genitals. If I saw a Zits comic where Jeremy bothers his parents, I would emit fragrant steam, but If I saw a Zits comic where his parents make him do chores, I would emit a 150-decibel foghorn sound. Performed unauthorized surgeries in the ravine. Voted against the incumbent school district superintendent. Teased an album release by mysteriously uploading a bonus track in the middle of the night. Bought out my dad’s company and then laid him off. Drew Mother’s bath at a temperature slightly too cold. Read the Bible backwards out loud to my little sister. Told my parents that when I tested the basement for radon I didn’t detect any radon even though I actually detected a shitload of radon. Drank water straight out of the tap while my stepmom was there. Get results Results for How Many Of These Ways Did You Rebel As A Teenager? You Rebelled In Every Possible Way As A Teenager! Unbelievable! In the time you spent between the ages of 13 and 19, you were a madperson. Bucking every convention, you refused to fit even the most charitable definition of how a teen should be, choosing instead to give yourself over to the rampant chaos of the devil. Those were wild days for you! Share Your Results Results for How Many Of These Ways Did You Rebel As A Teenager? You Rebelled A Lot As A Teenager! All right! At the teenage time of your life, you were about as rebellious as they come. You didn't know about rules back then, and if you'd found out, you wouldn't have cared, and if you'd cared, you wouldn't have cared because you didn't like them. The authority figures couldn't tame you, so they stopped trying, and you ran roughshod over the whole town. Then you grew up and you mellowed out, and everything was over for you. Wow! Share Your Results Results for How Many Of These Ways Did You Rebel As A Teenager? You Rebelled A Fair Amount As A Teenager! Teenagers will be teenagers, they say. This was as true for you as it was for anyone. You smoked some things you shouldn't have smoked, spoke some things you shouldn't have spoken, and smoked a few things that should only have been spoken. And hey, you turned out all right, didn't you? You were a normal rebel, all told. Here's to those wild days! Share Your Results Results for How Many Of These Ways Did You Rebel As A Teenager? You Barely Rebelled At All As A Teenager! What? It seems like your rebellion as a teenager was practically nonexistent. What were you thinking back then? How pathetic you must have been! Obeying every command and offhand comment your parents came up with! A prisoner in your ancestors' rules and regulations! Weep! Be sad! You have wasted your only youth! Share Your Results
